Side Effects: Nothing except little fatiigue after taking full morning dose _ i make extra time in my morning schedule for it. Uset stomach if taken on empty stomach otherwise it works wonders for me
Nightmares_dry mouth_ increased hunger_in a fog_ stomach cramps.
Memory loss_ angry outburst_ headaches_ hair loss_ mood swings_ tingling in arms_ jumbled thoughts_ side pains
Comments: Depakote isn't for me. Although it appeared to work in the first 3 months taking it in higher dosages is harmful.

Side Effects: To help my migraine headaches

It took care of my mania but I_ too_ was a little slowed downed & unmotivated.  But over time my body got used to it & I was able to function better.  Did cause some weight gain.  (I'm also taking 2 other drugs that cause weight gain_ so I got a triple whammy!). I found out that working out has_ at least_ kept my weight the same.
Comments: Because of the potential side effects of the liver_ I make sure that I get periodical testing to monitor my liver function. I will continue taking this drug the rest of my life however_ because of my age_ in the future I will have the dosage re-evaluated so I'm not over medicated.

Side Effects: Severe Memory Loss

Loss of physical and emotional connection to anyone. Very foggy mind. Couldn't think through anything clearly. Difficulty expressing feelings.  Gained 30lbs in 2 and a half years. Slept 10-12 hours every night and had to take a nap during the day. Showered only once a week and had no desire to look pretty or be hygienic. It took my life away and since stopping it I've noticed a remarkable difference for the better.
Comments: I hated Depakote and will NEVER take it again. I'm now going to have liposuction to get rid of all the traces of having taken this miserable drug.

Side Effects: Can of course put a bit of weight on_ but I think that this side effect is grossly exaggerated. Drowsiness_ so take before bed.
Comments: It's the best mood-stabilizer that there is_ in my estimation. I've taken it for 12 years now without incident.

Side Effects: Insomnia/Constant Headache
Comments: Only problems so far are I don't sleep (great for anger control lol)_ and seem to constantly have a low grade headache.  I really think that the headache is from the lack of sleep.  If I can find something that will help me sleep without knocking me completely out... I think I'll be great. The Depakote ER has GREATLY improved my anger outbursts and frustration.  I had previously begun a low carb diet so I feel this will help with any weight gain issues that may arise.

Side Effects: Mild weight gain. Occasional headaches.
Comments: This drug has been very helpful for me. As a man with epilepsy who has suffered from a few partial-complex seizures_ this drug has allowed me to be seizure free for 3+ years. The downside is no alcohol consumption_ but other than that I definitely recommend it for someone who suffers from epilepsy.

Side Effects: Slight weight gain / dry mouth
Comments: Depakote has been a great drug to keep me stable and prevent the ups and downs of Bi-Polar. I also take Seroquel with the Depakote at bedtime because I have a sleep disorder as well and this has worked great for the last 8 years. I take 2 - 500mg at night with 400mg Seroquel. Depakote does have a few side effects such as weight gain but for me the benefits are worth it.

Side Effects: Headaches
Extreme fatigue_ breast pain_ nausea/diarrhea_ headaches and a slow speech.

As soon as I took this_ I felt searing pain in my liver area.  Basically_ the right side of my belly_ underneath my ribcage and all the way around to the back.  I know this medication can cause liver failure_ so I quit it immediately.  I felt the GABA in my brain increase_ and I'll admit_ if I didn't have liver issues_ I would love to take Depakote.  Talk about calm.  Dang.
Comments: I already had fatty liver when I took the Depakote.  The extra GABA in my brain felt amazing.  It's what I know I'm missing out on_ but unfortunately_ I'm not willing to risk death in order to feel better.  Nobody knows about this drug for bipolar_ but Keppra.  Look into it!  If you suffer from ultra-rapid cycling on a daily basis like I do_ this drug could be your savior.  The side effects are practically nothing compared to Lithium and Depkoate.  People who are manic depressive probably already have issues with their bodies and organs.  I know I do_ from all the drinking and drugs done in the past.  I needed something that wouldn't drive my liver enzymes up and cause me chest pain_ like both Lithium and Depakote did.  In comes Keppra_ a novel anticonvulsant.  It can work for rapid cycling_ you guys.  Look into it.  Request it.  You can take it with a bad liver too.

Side Effects: Started during a mixed episode. Every attempt to bump up to 750 mg resulted in bad side effects... Ringing in ear_ insomnia and when I slept it was more of a sleep paralysis with EXTREME nightmares. Headaches_ nausea and depression. Am currently on 500 mg and feel ok
I like it because it gives me time to filter and process my thoughts. It makes me really freaking tired though. I got put on bupropion and it has helped a lot but I'm still so damn tired.

Hair loss_ unexplained bruising on legs_ loss of appetite_ nausea_ double vision_ short term memory loss_ sleepy. Almost all of these side effects have went away over time it was mostly just the first year. I'm still tired alot and will randomly have huge bruises appear on my legs_ and I feel like I forget alot of things but that could just be a coincidence.  It's the only thing that stopped my seizures so the side effects are not a big deal considering the alternative.
Memory loss_ insomnia depression/lack of motivation causing life events_ anxiety
Comments: Pretty much was ok with a DepakoteER/Lamictal combo for Tx but I have come very concerned about memory retention through the last several years_ general sadness and depression.  If I miss a couple doses_ severe agitation kicks in.Marked negativity the last several months.  Doc seemed ok with "flat" mood most of the time during followups. Last appt. he recommended therapy for the depression but increased Lamictal. I just lost my 2nd job of 6 years_ this last one due to oversleeping 2X (company policy -- termination). Brain fog with the job and performance_ but have been concerned for a long time.  I really don't want to increase Depakote_ caused brain fog before_ or add a drug_ have had it with this. I feel like I have lost a decade off my life_ cannot even remember events where kids were growing up due to memory. Sometimes wife says "don't you remember that" I don't _ it just makes me feel awful. Never had issues with the hair loss_ just a little weight gain. God bless to everyone with mental health issues_ there will be a special place in heaven for all of us_ I am positive of that.

Side Effects: Weight gain_ about 10 pounds but that may be my own fault. Tiredness the first few weeks.
Comments: Mood seems much more stable_ I was manic when it was prescribed. Titrated from 500mg to 1500mg over 3 days. I was initially reluctant to take any meds_ but I feel much calmer and yet energetic at the same time_ rather than agitated as usual in a hypomanic mood.

Side Effects: initially spaciness and sleepiness as well as difficulty concentrating.  Weight gain and extreme hunger as well as some hair loss-this can be controlled with a multivitamin!  The weight gain and hunger are slowing down and after a couple of weeks_ the thinking improved greatly.  Still get weird dreams_ but I  have had much worse side effects than this from other meds_ so I handle it well.
Comments: This is a good drug; anyone who says take lithium or another drug before this doesn't know what they are talking about_  everyone is different! Don't make general accusations about medicines and scare people away from something that may help them. Research is showing that people with different genes respond differently to bipolar medications_ in fact lithium made me much worse_ and there is new research that supports that apoptosis may increase in people who don't do well on lithium.  My mood is much more stable_ irritability_ jealousy and anger are all but gone_ and I exercise to keep the depression at bay.  This is my second time on the drug_ it worked wonders the first time too_ but my liver enzymes shot up_ not happening this time though_ and God willing_ it won't.  Do I like taking medicine? No. Do I have a choice. No. So I will go with the one that works best_ and no drug is perfect.  Realize that now and you will be better off.  As long as they are tolerable.Thank you God for letting me be successful on this!

Update: The tremors have lessened_ but the heartburn is worse and I have now developed scalp pain and hair loss. I will be discontinuing the med and will have to hope that Seroquel will do the trick for mania.

Side Effects: Weight Gain and that's with dieting and exercise. Always feel hungry and can eat larger amounts than ever been able too! Lazy/Tiredness.. But stop convulsion..
weight gain_ tremors in hands_ menstrual irregularities_ short term memory loss_ tingling in arms_ swelling of lower legs and ankles_ heat sensitivity.
Comments: I was tapered of Depakote and have been off this medication for 3 weeks.  I feel clearer mentally and the adverse symptoms have lessened or ceased altogether.

Side Effects: The first month I was doing 500mg/day and felt no side effects. I researched the heck out them_ so I knew that weight gain was very possible. I immediately quit soda! lol I love soda. I did not lose nor gain the first month_ so I think that I counteracted the weight gain. The last 2 weeks_ I have been increased to 750mg per day at bedtime_ and I have experienced some quickness of the digestive system. No problem_ though. Makes me feel detoxified! I do not feel sleepy_ rather more energetic. Sometimes mildly manic. For the increase these last 2 weeks_ I have started running again (well_ it is 1/2 run and 1/2 walk right now). Still_ no weight gain_ but I am ready with more ammunition if I see any creepers.
Comments: I was on Lithium 750mg for over 2 years_ from when I was first diagnosed_ but my blood tests showed that my thyroid went haywire (hypo) and my kidney(s?) started struggling_ so we switched me to Depakote. I was nervous because I FEAR change_ but I honestly feel better! I feel like there was a fog (maybe from the Lithium) has cleared and I am happier. I went through a few different antidepressants the last 2 years because I think the Lithium had me a little smothered. When I first switched_ I went through a couple of weeks where I was EXTREMELY agitated and irritable...over-sensitive and over-reacting. I think that was the withdrawal from the Lithium. I feel better now_ although I will admit to some excited anxiety...another scary way to say mania. My biggest fear of all of the side effects was weight gain_ but I hope to be able to control it. Most of the other side effects were the same as Lithium_ so I have already been dealing with swollen hands and feet_ hair loss_ and tremors for over 2 years. My hair fell OUT with Lithium. I lost half my density...but I got a shorter style and did a Keratin strength treatment and my hair has not felt better in 10 years. The Depakote is better than Lithium for me_ so far. Should have tried it sooner_ but the weight gain scared me away.

Side Effects: Loss of appetite_ tired heavy feeling that comes in waves_ nausea_ dizziness_ sexual function is actually better... But I'm also on wellbutrin and vyvanse_ which increase libido_ foggy/distant feeling... But I had some of that before.
Severe tremor/shakiness_ bad constipation_ extreme nausea throughout the day.
Comments: Worked wonderful for mood stabilization but the side effects outweigh the positives. Was sad to have to get off of it since it was working for my bipolar.

Side Effects: Stomach Pain_ Nausea_ GERD_ Foggy Brain_ Memory Problems_ Verbal Problems_ Slowed Speech_ Extreme Fatigue_ Tremors_ Bone Loss_ Mild Hair Loss_ Loss of Sex Drive and life in general.
Comments: Prior to taking Depakote I did not have any of the symptoms stated in side-effects.  I was a very active_ hard working young career woman.  I was diagnosed w/epilepsy after having a grand mal seizure at 32 yrs old.  After bad experiences w/tegretol and mysoline it was determined Depakote was the best drug for me.  After all these years I am still having these "side effects" which some have turned into real health problems.  Such as:  I have severe osteoporosis - broke 3 ribs and my foot getting out of bed 2 yrs ago.  I struggle with major stomach pain_ nausea and GERD on a daily basis.  I literally shake now.  And last but not least I feel like I have early onset Alzheimers because of the brain fog and memory problems.  Seems like I can't put 2 words together.  I have an appointment w/ my neurologist next week to discuss going off the medication.  I have not had a seizure since 1988 and most of my EEGs have been good.  Don't get me wrong_ I think Depakote does a great job_ but for me the side effects just don't seem worth it.  I can't work.  I want more out of life.

Side Effects: I found with this medication I gained 15 lbs. Also my orgasms seem to take a longer amount of time to be reached. Other than that I am very please with this medication. It serves it's purpose in keeping my moods stable.
Very mild sexual dysfunction (slightly delayed orgasm)_ mild nausea if taken with no food_ otherwise no nausea.
Comments: So far my side effects have been far fewer with Depakote than with many of the other mood-stabilizing drugs I have been tried on.  Some sedated me_ others put 40 pounds on me_ one gave me tremors.  I've experienced none of that with Depakote.  Not every drug is for every person_ but this one has worked very well for me.

Side Effects: My daughter began taking Depakote for years_ ages 3-7 on a high dosages due to seizures. It controlled seizures.  Her mood swings where terrible_ anger_ could not learn in school. Kicking biting_ hitting and self injurious behavior. Again it controlled her seizures but the behaviors are not acceptable. We are now on Lamictal doing better for about 2 years now.
Comments: Never give up on your kids. They ONLY have us_ no one else cares like you do....That is why you are on this site.

Side Effects: Insomnia_ reflux_ diarrhea_ bloating_ dry skin_ hair loss_ achy teeth_ teeth clenching_ seeing things that aren't there_ sore breasts_ weight gain_ short-term memory loss_ mental fogginess.
Comments: You get used to the side effects.  I now have to drug myself with Restoril to get to sleep.  Despite all of the side effects_ I still give Depakote a "5".  I'm hoping my hair will eventually grow back.  I gained 11 lbs in less than 3 weeks.  At least I'm happy!

Side Effects: I started at 250mg Depakote ER 1x/night.  After a week I took myself off of it due sleeping 10-13 hrs. a night and still feeling extremely tired/drowsy during the day.  Due to the severity of the daily pain and migraines I was having and at the recommendation of my Dr. I went back on it w/in 2 weeks. I increased the dose from 250mg to 500mg after a week. I figured that since I was incapacitated by pain every day maybe the Depakote would help_ and that even if I was sleeping all day/night_ at least I wouldn't be in pain.  Besides extremely vivid dreams_ the extreme tiredness is the only side effect that I've experienced.
Comments: I've been on Depekote for 4 weeks now and went from having daily migraines/moderate to extreme pain every day to having none/dull headache after 10 days on the med. Been mostly pain free since.  HOWEVER_ the side effect of sleeping 10-13 hrs every day and still feeling like I could sleep all day is making me consider whether or not to continuing taking this med.  Dr. said these side effects would mitigate but they have not.  My main goal is to get back to work_ but cannot do so if in pain everyday or unable to function due to extreme drowsiness - catch 22.Background:  I've suffered from migraines for 10 years with increasing frequency/pain within the past five years averaging 8-15 a month.  This fall and last fall have been especially bad.  Over the years_ I had tried every preventative and they have either not been effective or the side effects were too extreme. This fall I suffered from especially severe migraines/possible clusters that led me to the brink.  My neurologist is prescribing Botox injections which ins. just approved but am hesistant about this tx.

Side Effects: I'm a lean guy_ in shape. I just think I got used to any of the side effects years ago. Blood work/cholesterol/BP always good.
Comments: I have stuck with this drug.  I tried changing once & realized how much it helps me. My life is far from perfect but I never get too 'high' or 'low'. I depend on it. Full head of hair too.

Side Effects: Severe tremoring in hands_ insomnia_ memory loss_ increased saliva
Comments: Severe tremors/shaking in hands. Also taking lithium & abilfy_ so completely unsure which drug is causing this. My short term memory is horrible and I find myself pausing to think about what I'm talking about. Severe saliva which is completely embarrassing if you're talking to someone. I was told to give everything at least 4 weeks but from these comments it doesnt sound like it will get better. I havent experienced any hair loss thankfully and I have no appettie (and I can't spell either anymore). Total insomnia.

Side Effects: Wow_ what a difference!  I am so happy I have maintained this drug.  I quit once and was quickly reminded how it is without it.
Comments: It really does work.

Side Effects: unsure yet. acne_ diarrhea_ EXTREME irritability and tearfulness_ dnagerouse thoughyts....
Comments: just went off lithium that i had been on for 4 years...not sure if these changes are from this_ b/c they kinda came on before  or b/c my hormone levels are severally out of whack. I take progesterone and have for years as well...but was off it _ then back on etc...when i first began depakote it was good_ these recent abnormal things have occurred in last month_ around my cyle

Side Effects: I literally slept 2 1/2 yrs of my life away and gained 135lbs i could not get out of bed
Comments: this medicine was not for me i didnt benefit from it i had no life behind my eyes my family said i didnt laugh cry or get angry no matter what that was when i was awake usually i took my morning dose at 8am slept 12 hours then took the night dose and there went all my hope until one day i missed my morning dose and sat on the couch i sat there till bedtime and realized it was the medicine and not my mental diagnosis i begged my doc to lower the dose she did after 8 months she put me on 500mg a day down from 1000mg i was able to bath again and watch tv and enjoy it do laundry cook badly and all kinds of stuff i told her this and she said looks like were gonna have to raise it again but by that time i was down to 125mg i said ok to her but went home and split the 125mg tab in half took it for a month and split half a tablet in half took that 4 a month and i havent been on it in a year but this medicine is dangerous it can make you convulse if you quit cold turkey so do it slowly if you decide to well thats my story good luck and bless you

Side Effects: This drug is very good for epilepsy. i've tried so many others like Tegretal_ Keppra_ Trileptal they all caused chest pains but this drug does not. Depakote does have tolerable side effects compared to chest pains. Causes weight gain_ everything tastes like a gourmet meal_ hair loss is very thin and wispy. So fatigued in the afternoon. a lot of stomach issues_ gas_ bloating_ diarrhea then constipaion. Ugghh !But I'm seizure free! You must do some kind of exercise on this drug to keep the weight down.
Comments: Was on regular Depakote for 20 years and had more weight gain.

Side Effects: 15-20 lbs of weight gain_ extreme tiredness in the mornings_ seems like you never get enough sleep.  Calms your nerves however_ makes me more relaxed during the day_ helps me speaking in public.  Prevents the daily headaches I was experiencing and reduces the severity of my migraines.
Comments: Only migraine preventative medicine that worked for me_ I have managed to decrease dosage down from 1000 mg per day and the medicine is still effective. I've experienced withdrawal symptoms coming down on dosage_ takes weeks to taper down_ very edgy during this period.

Side Effects: Lost a lot of my hair_ gained 20 lbs_ hands shake.

Memory problems (left food cooking on high and left the house to go shopping)_ constipation_ muscle and joint pain_ painful inflamed rash on lower abdomen and itchy over entire body_ hair & eye lashes falling out.
Comments: My mind felt calm and ok but my body was reacting strongly negatively to the medication.

Side Effects: I was prescribed 500 mg ER in the a.m. and 1_000 mg at bedtime. The night dose really made me tired. I could barley function at night to get up with up with my one year old son. So his father stayed up all night and took care of him while I slept. She lowered the dose at bedtime to 500 mg. I really like that they help threwout the whole day. Certain times of the early afternoon or night I get worked up. I dont like that it causes weight gain though. I will see if there is another medicine that I can take for mania that doesnt do that. I also take Buspar 20 mg twice daily and 300 mg of Wellbutrin Xl. The combination is helping so far.
Comments: My mother took Depakote and Serequol and Lithium for Bipolar Disorder. It helped her with the racing thoughts and frequent outburts of rage.

Side Effects: Going against my better judgement_ I agreed to start Depakote from my new psych. even after I had heard countless of horror stories_ thinking maybe it would be my "miracle" drug....and I was dead wrong. I was started on a medium doseage of 1500mg and within a week I couldn't leave my house. I was so detached from the world. I had no emotion_ no connection to reality. And even worse_ it didn't treat my anxiety. So I was trying to function in a zombie-like-state with a constant high-anxiety. I didn't even want to talk. And I'm one of those annoying girls who can't keep her mouth shut. My friends were literally scared of me. I called my Dr. crying at the end of the week before I was supposed to get my blood levels drawn_ crying_ the only emotion I had_ telling them that they either medically had to take me off of it or I was just going to flush the pills dow the toilet myself. PLEASE STAY AWAY!!!!
Comments: PLEASE_ I BEG YOU DO NOT TAKE IT!

Side Effects: Hair loss_ insomnia_ constipation
Comments: I started taking it when diagnosed with JME (turns out it was permanent) and have had chronic constipation and insomnia since (on Ambien for sleep).  When my MD decided_ without informing me) to up my dose from 750 mg of regular Depakote to 1000 mg Depakote ER I started to experience constant_ abnormal hair loss.  I'm seeing the MD soon to get switched to something else and hopefully get rid of some of these symptoms.

Side Effects: Some initial heartburn_ mostly minor stuff that passed.
Comments: I am an executive that needs to make quick decisions and remain calm.  I have been taking 750mg of Depakote ER since the year 2000 (when it was introduced).  It has saved my career.  I work out and remain active and have gained no weight.  I also have a full head of hair.

Side Effects: INCREASED HUNGER_ Lethargy_ Drowsiness_ CLOUDY THINKING_ Irritated
Comments: I work in a job that requires quick accurate thinking and deals with finance numbers. On this drug not only am I ready to sleep all day_ I am more irritated and can't think straight. my doctor is taking me off of depakote and starting zyprexa which based off of everything i have read is not good either. I was diagnosed as bipolar at 16 but have not been on meds for the past 7 years. I was stable until 12 weeks ago when I decided to quit smoking. since then I have had uncontrolable rage and my mood swings are changing within hours. My husband actually left for 3 days to force me to get help. I need a medication that will not impair my thinking or I am going to lose my job.

Side Effects: SEVERE Fatigue! Flattened me like a mack truck! 1000 mg dose for two weeks then weaned off to 500 mg for a week.  Took another week to start feeling more normal.  Withdrawal headaches_ shakiness and felt like crap for a few days.
Comments: Don't know why the doctor put me on this for depression after a suicide attempt.  It made me miss 3 more weeks of school. I usually work out twice a day (athlete) but couldn't do more than flop on the couch or sleep the 3 weeks I was on it.  Currently on 10 mg Lexapro and 2 mg Abilify which is working GREAT!

Side Effects: The major side effect I was experiencing constantly was insomnia.  Not a very good issue when you are a BiPolar patient.
Some sleepiness at about the 4-5 hr mark_ some gastro effects (i.e. constipation_ diarrhea_ mild).  Vivid dreams_ though not bad.  Just_ well_ animated at times.
Comments: A great drug when the right dose is found.  I'm currently on 2000mg/day at bedtime_ and this is the first time in years I've been able to sleep pretty well.  Very helpful with the mania.  I am much more relaxed and in control of myself.  Can think more clearly without all of the "mental clutter" that I had before. Overall a very good drug.

Side Effects: Increased sensitivity to my nerves! Anyone else feel like nails on a chalkboard after taking this for a while?! Or sensitivity to touching paper? Also_ very tired in the morning. When I first started taking it_ I got severe stomach cramps for a few days_ but then it subsided. Some hair loss_ and probably no weight gain only because I've been very careful to keep it off.
Comments: Didn't work for my migraines. Onto the next med...

Side Effects: When I switched to the Extended Release version none
Comments: There is no question this medicine helps me a lot.  It's effects on anxiety are hard to explain.  I just know I will be stable regardless of what the situation is.  It stabilizes my mood_ which is what I want.  I take 750mg per day.

Side Effects: weight gain
Comments: The only seizures I've had were when I was off Depakote.  Battling weight gain and paying its steep price (until it went generic recently) are decent trade-offs.

Side Effects: Obsessive suicidal thoughts
Comments: I was fine until I reached the low therapeutic level. My thoughts ALWAYS involved suicide after that.

Side Effects: While reportings of hair loss_ weight gain and memory loss are prevalent_ I have little. I'm on 250mg/day. I've noticed a slight headache about 5-6 hrs after dosage_ making me sleepy_ but relaxed. Due to my work schedule_ I take at 11:30 am my headhache occurs at 5-6 pm and by 7pm I'm just relaxed. I've been watching for weight gain but in fact have lost weight_ I just don't feel hungry. Because I'm hypoglycemic_ I used to eat every 2 hrs to control by blood sugar_ but I don't have this problem anymore. Thank God for my habit of eating because with Depakote I wouldn't think to eat at all. I have notice some hair loss. Minor. Memeory_ it may take me minute to remember the lastest but I still remember all of the old. I'm not aware of what day it is_ but that's okay. Life is alltogether better and living one day at a time_ like it should be. I'm 100% more focused and getting more things done without feeling stressed to get it all done. I wish I would of been on this 10 yrs ago_ but everyt
I did gain 10 pounds and have hand tremors sometimes. Other than that_ it has helped me to focus better. I still have some manic episodes but not as many.
Some tiredness at times and occassional indigestion but it has really worked great for me.

hair loss_ fatigue_ very vivid dreams/nightmares (I sometimes confused dreams with memories)_ impaired memory._ fatigue_ hard time focusing_ hard time communicating efficiently_ made some of my gastrointestinal issues worse_ sexual side effects
Comments: Have been taking 1250mg each night for several years for my bipolar disorder. It's hard to differentiate between side effects of this medication and the symptoms of all my other disorders because of the way things happened when I went on the meds_ and ever since then. I could have more than this but I'm fairy certian the stated effects are in fact due to this medication.It HAS helped curve my mood swings but I don't feel that it is doing enough. I'm going to go to my doctor to try and find a med that works better for me. After all_ there are plenty I haven't tried.

Side Effects: Daily fatigue_ lots of gas_ constipation then diarrhea after meals_ belly weight gain_ poor vision.
Comments: Losing a 1/3 of my hair_ gained 40 lbs in 5 months. Enough explosive gas to power a small outboard boat motor_constipation_ diarrhea and fatigue_ no sex drive_poor eyesight_ this drug makes me feel like I am 90. But NO seizures! Keppra_ Lamictal_ Trileptal all gave me chest pains and break through petite Mal seizures.:^)

Side Effects: Weight gain (50 lbs in 2.5 years)_ increased appetite_ difficulty waking in the morning_ markedly decreased libido.
Comments: I stopped taking this drug at the recommendation of my therapist after two years of therapy. I had been diagnosed as bipolar following a period of drug abuse_ and didn't exhibit the signs after being clean for a while. After coming off of this drug_ I did notice that I had to make a more conscious effort to concentrate for a while. This isn't necessarily a bad thing. As I wasn't taking it for seizures_ I didn't taper off_ I just stopped taking it. I had no withdrawal symptoms other than the one mentioned above. Within one month of stopping this drug_ I lost 15 pounds and my appetite was more normal. My libido remained diminished due to other medications.

Side Effects: depression_ anxiety_stomach pains. Felt like I was 'losing it'.
Comments: Did prevent migraines_ but at the cost of me crying my eyes out on the floor. When that passed I just felt like I was 'blah' all day. Not happy_ not sad. Just in limbo. Angry outbursts too.

Side Effects: none so far

I've been taking it for 14 days. Initially I was very euphoric_ it seemed like a wonder drug_ but then the side effects kicked in. So far I am experiencing an increased appetite_ very vivid dreaming and recall_ memory loss_ and I THINK I have confused a dream with reality at least once_ and I KNOW I have completely forgotten a whole conversation_ plus the depression has gotten worse. I'm hoping that increasing my anti-depressant will improve that. I take Depakote ER in conjunction with Wellbutrin XL and Buspar for anxiety.
Comments: I'm going to give it about 5 more weeks for the sides to level off and if not I'll switch meds (again!) I was on Lithium before but it was ruining my skin. I think I'll try Topomax next if this doesn't work

Side Effects: Hair loss_ visual hallucinations_ spacey-feeling_ weight gain_ acne_ constipation_ high liver enzyme count. I also get horrible stomach pains every few days since i started taking it_ but I'm not sure if that's from the meds or not.
Comments: At 1000mg I experienced weight gain_ hair loss_ zombie like feeling_ constipation_ trails in my vision_ and a high liver enzyme count. At 1250mg I felt completely out of it_ with all of the symptoms enhanced. Now at 500mg there's constipation_ acne_  and still losing some hair. I guess my mood is stable_ but my doctor isn't all that great and gives me the runaround like no other.

Side Effects: So Far I am just really tired.. I notice it leaves me feeling high after taking it_ but my doctor said that will go away with time and so will the tiredness. I havent noticed any weight gain but it has only been a week. I was on 250 mg for 4 days (accidently missed a dose) and 500 for the past 3 days (accidently missed a dose on that too)
Comments: It has helped me slightly so far. I feel sort of dazed but dont feel like punching someone in the face in the last couple of days

Side Effects: At first some weight gain_ about 10 pounds.  Like the person below I used to take the regular and now take the extended release version.  Less side effects_ weight back to normal.
Comments: Where do I start?  I used to have 7-10 partial seizures a year.  One limb shaking uncontrollably and I never knew when it would happen.  On top of that I have Bipolar disorder.  I had side effects with Lamictal_ Tegretol_ and Dilantin and still had seizures.  Dilantin was before the BP diagnosis.  Like the person below_ I have NEVER had a seizure on Depakote/Depakote ER.  I have confidence and don't worry anymore.  I have my good and bad days like everyone but my moods are better and I this med slams the door on any seizure activity.

Side Effects: Weight gain_ hair loss
Comments: I took regular Depakote for years before ER was available.  Both have been great for my seizure disorder (Juvenile Myoclonic Epilepsy_ or JME).  Weight gain is the big downside_ and as I got over age 40 I have gained weight.  Am now really focusing on diet and exercise_ but have never had a seizure while on Depakote - can't say that for any other of the meds I've tried other than Keppra which is also a good one for me.  I tried Lamictal (couldn't get seizure free on it without feeling really dizzy all the time) and Topamax (bad digestive side effects and double vision)_ so for me Depakote is a life-saver.

Side Effects: Compared to other meds I have taken not many and they did eventually go away.  My body must have ajusted.
Comments: At least I am never nervous anymore and focus is fine.  I love this medicine.

Side Effects: Slight_but not noticeable hair loss in the beginning_ weight gain of about 40lbs in 3 years I've been on the medication. I have also experienced a little bit of lethargy.. seems I don't quite have the energy that I used to.
Comments: After having one headache that lasted 2 years_ I feel like Depakote ER gave me my life back.  Within two weeks after starting it_ my headache was all but gone. I am now using it for prevention. I love this med_ inspite of the weight gain_ which I am now trying very hard to control through diet and exercise.  Being pain free is so wonderful.  I still have an occasional headache that I control with Fiorinal.  I can function/work/enjoy life again.  I would like to get off this drug eventually_ but it does seem like everytime I try to scale back the dosage and get off of it_ the headaches return.  .. hopefully that will change in time.

Side Effects: Very hard time focusing_ it was ADHd all over again. Amnesia!!!!! Amnesia!!!!! I couldn't remember a thing!! And a little weight gain.
Comments: I'm a college student_ so all I care about is focusing. Some people call this drug the gold standard. This drug works miracles for people and I hope it does for you. But as for me_ well it caused more problems then it was set out to cure.

Side Effects: Not many at all and they went away.
Comments: I can't believe some of the things people say about this drug on this board.  It has helped me big time and it's not a 'zombie med to be avoided'.  That's just stupid.  I am 5'11 and work out every day.  I weigh 172 pounds and have all of my hair.  I take 750mg a day and am an executive who interacts with people every day.  It's helpful_ not hurtful.

Side Effects: Everything tastes like a gourmet meal_ slight weight gain (though necessary as I suffer from anorexia)_ vivid dreams_ sociopathic tendencies_ insomnia
Comments: I have gained weight since taking Depkote_ but since I was 90 pounds before_ this is a good thing.  I'm much more clever and well-liked now (probably because I went off Topamax).  I feel very balanced in moods.  However_ I'm extremely sociopathic now (even if people are drawn to me).  I care nothing about the feelings of others_ I indirectly hurt others if I think it will benefit me_ I don't care what people say about me_ I tell people whatever I want (bad in customer service)_ and I cut out many people in my life because I stopped caring about them.  I feel no guilt about anything anymore and I don't care about others.  This is likely unhealthy_ but honestly_ I don't care as only others seem to get hurt by this.

Side Effects: EXTREME fatigue.  Impaired memory.
Comments: A "zombie" med to be avoided.

Side Effects: Horrible_ crippling nausea
Comments: This was the 2nd of 3 meds the dr. has prescribed 4 me since being diagnosed 10 mos. ago w/ bipolar 1. I was given Lamictal 1st & it absolutely saved my life by very nearly eliminating the depression I had suffered thru for 3 yrs. The mania_ however_ began affecting me agn in Jan which is when I was given Depakote ER. The 1st 2 days were fine_ no side effects. The next 3 wks_ however_ were hell. I was doubled over w/ debilitating nausea. I cld not get out of bed & was unable 2 do anything but lay there & try not 2 vomit. I felt horrible & was in agonizing pain. Finally_ I talked 2 the dr. who said 2 immediately stop taking it & go back 2 Lamictal exclusively. I am not saying this is a bad medicine just that_ 4 some ppl_ this meds side effects are far 2 harsh 2 deal with. It was not even possible 4 me 2 function while on this med. I do not know how it effected my mania because I was not on it 4 long & felt only pain while on it. Luckily 4 me_ though_ my dr. put m

Side Effects: None at a low dose.
Comments: I love these people that say DO NO TAKE IT!!  That's the worst advice ever.  It has worked for me_ calmed me down.  It may or may not work for you but try some of the other meds and see how you react to them compared to Depakote ER.

I have taken this drug since it was introduced as an extended release in 2000 and it has been great. I take 750mg and I can depend on it.  It has eliminated my anxiety and helped my moods.  I do take a multi-vitamin with it_ always have.  I trust this drug.

Side Effects: nausea_ lethargy_ throwing up_ blood in urine_ awful awful drug_ depression_ hallucinations(Visual and auditory)_ headaches
Comments: DO NOT TAKE IT!!!

Side Effects: None
Comments: Lamictal (200mg a day) did nothing for me but cause side effects: dizziness_ nausea_ headaches and language & memory problems. Depakote (1400mg a day) dramatically improved the mixed manic states with zero side effects. It also really improved the depression aspect even though its not known to do that. Not that I am complaining

Side Effects: Took for three months and right off the start_ huge appitite and weight gain as a result up to 20-25 lbs_ rash on both arms_ tired and loss of interest in anything_ but most disturbing for me now after stopping it is EXTREME HAIR LOSS AND SHEDDING!This is devistating as a women with already thin hair and the prognosses given by my dermatolgosit after thyroid testing okay is called: telogen effluvium. WOW... would never have taken it with this outcome!

Hair loss_ but taking high levels of selenium_ zinc and biotin supplements stopped it.  Acne at the beginning. Loss of appetite at the beginning. And I lost some weight too. No increase in appetite for me.
Comments: You need to try to get through the first month or so to see the benefits. The side effects at first are hard_ but this drug helped me when all other failed. I take 1500mg.

Side Effects: Hair loss_ sleepiness
Comments: My son has been on this drug since last May. Someone posted that they did not have health insurance and the cost of this drug is VERY expensive_ $300.  My son does not have health insurance either_ I did some research and found Select Care Benefits where his meds are free but I pay $30 month for processing.

Side Effects: Weight gain (15lbs in 6 weeks once I hit the 1250mg dosage)_ mental fog - mixing up words in my sentences_ not being able to think of the words I was trying to say. Sleep improved but morning grogginess was there.
Comments: It worked AMAZING at stabilizing my moods!! Everyone I was around noticed the transformation... no more SNAP rages. I just couldn't do the weight gain. Slowly decreasing dosage and going on another med.

Side Effects: anger_ restlessness_ didn't work
Comments: My father was given this for early stage dementia_ which I am not sure should be an approved use. He is  angry at getting old and being in  a hospital_ then a crappy nursing home_ then a hospital again. Now he is at a decent nursing home_ but they couldn't get him off the habit of being up nights and napping during the day. He was doing this at home since retirement_ and this depakote seemed to make this problem worse. He was apathetic when he wasn't angry and swearing_ and the depakote affected his personality for the worse. He finally was taken off it and his regular personality is starting to emerge_ but I think some damage was done to his memory. It's hard to prove at his age_ but I think we all should be suspicious of medications given to older people_ especially when there are not enough studies to justify using them. He was never bipolar_ never had seizures. Why this for dementia? It seemed to exaggerate his moods_ which led to them giving him two other anti-depressants to make

Side Effects: Hardly any side effects until dosage increased from 1500mg/day to 1750/day.  Major hair loss and texture changed from shiny_ smooth curls to dull_ coarse_ brittle hair.  Lost over 1/3 of hair.
Comments: Started taking one Centrum Silver vitamin per day along with 600 mg of calcium w/Vitamin D twice daily.  Hair no longer falls out anymore and is coming in curly_ but texture still not great.  Would totally recommend Centrum Silver & Calcium/Vitamin D supplements.

Side Effects: weight gain
Comments: complete maintenance

Side Effects: lethargy_ brain fog
Comments: i take 500 mg and it has stabilized my mood (which is great) but it makes me feel dumb and tired.

Side Effects: extreme sleepiness during the day_ weight gain (unsure of amount) & a bit of hair loss. i need to add we are still working out the dosage levels but at this time i'm at 1250 mg._ taking 1000 at night time. my doctor hopes to get my dosage more balanced as we move forward by adding other medications to help with depakote-induced sleepiness as well as other conditions i have.
Comments: helps me sleep at night due to the sleepiness it causes_ better dream recall & my migraines have all but disappeared. considering i had my 1st migraine when was 5 or 6 years old just having hardly any headpain at all can boost one's mood_ bipolar or not!

Side Effects: Extreme lethargy.  Feeling of being in a dream-like state.  Vivid_ strange dreams.
Comments: I've only been taking it for about 2 weeks_ so I can't say much about side effects or how well it works.  I've been put on 750mg at night (worked up slowly).  So far_ I've had trouble with lethargy (Jesus!  Depression causes this enough already!) and just being generally sleepy.  It's almost like a sudden burst of exhaustion.  I start to feel like I'm dreaming and space out a bit.  It usually happens around 5pm.  It's curious_ because this is around when I used to have my serious anxiety attacks during the day_ and I wonder if this has something to do with it.  Anyways_ I do feel that the medication has helped stabilize my mood thus far.  My anxiety has been largely curbed (THANK YOU) and my hypomania seems to stop before it starts.  Can't be too sure so far_ though.  We'll see.

Side Effects: Slight tremor once in a while.  I have taken this drug for 7 years and adjusted to any minor side effects after a year.
Comments: This drug works great.  I have always taken 750mg a day and have not had to increase the dosage.  It works better for me if I take 3 250mg tablets seperately per day.  This drug makes my mind feel normal (not to up or down) and really helps eliminate anxiety.  I obviously have had a positive response and will probably take it for the rest of my life.

Side Effects: Increased appetite for carbs.  I have gained 35 lbs in 5 months and no matter how little I eat_ I gain an average of 1-2 lbs per week.  I sleep a lot and feel frazzled. My libido is gone.  I am ready to begin decreasing dosage and find alternate natural remedies.
Comments: I do feel an overall release of tension approximately 30-45 mins after taking daily dose of 50mg.

Side Effects: The most awful medication I ever took. Since day one_ I started taking 750 mg a day_ I couldn't sleep at all_ my body had awful aches and pains_ in less than two months I gain 17 pounds.  I couldn't stopping eating I felt like I had hole on my stomach_ I was depressed more than never. When my doctor double the dosage for 1500 mg/day I went really crazy_ the pain became unberable_ I couldn't sleept even for a minute I was a zombie.  At times I thought I was going to die.
Comments: I sttoped taking and the aches and pain disappeared_ although I continued depressed_ and my appetite has decreased_ but I can't seem to put off the weight I gain.

Side Effects: feel retarded_ daytime sleepiness and feel stoned.
Comments: It is controlling my crazy dreams and letting me sleep again but i feel like i am on a high dose (1500 mg) and I don't like that.  I don't like taking 3 huge horse pills at night when i am already tired.  So far no hair loss or tremors_ hoping to get down some on the dose to avoid any weight gain_ tremors_ or hair loss.  I got to reduce my lamictal which is nice since it is friggin expensive.

Side Effects: I am morbidly_ and occasionally suicidally depressed so goddamn bad I can't stand myself_ I pissed my pants standing in line at a gas station_ I take everything people say to me as a personal attack_ I can't work_ walk more than 20-50 feet comfortable_ very fatigued_ exhausted_ sleep 15+ hours and just cant fkn wake up_ no energy_ no desire to do anything but eat and be depressed. The ONLY thing this drug has done for me is made me not have serious Manic episodes. I fkn hate myself right now and cant deal or tolerate anyfknthing.
hand tremors_ constipation_ and my hair became dry and very curly.  The good news:   headaches decreased in frequency and severity.
Some hair thinning_increased appetite_craving for carbs_ 8 pound weight gain.
Comments: I really like this drug. I haven't had any real bad side effects with it so far. I was on Equetro_ and all that did was make me want to slit my wrists.Depakote has made life worth living again. Even if I may end up bald and fat_lol

Side Effects: 40lbs weight gain in about 6 months.  And I thought I was depressed before...
Comments: I loved it other than the weight gain.  And then when my insurance screwed me over and I had to come off cold turkey_ the discontinuation of this and Effexor together was a hellish nightmare.

Side Effects: severe sleepiness during the day_ lack of motivation_ increased hunger (& weight gain)
Comments: I really hated this stuff. It may have helped with my migraines_ but not enough to be worth it.

Side Effects: Scalp rash_ hair loss and almost daily headaches.
Comments: I took Depakote ER 500 mg.  I am losing my hair by the clumpfuls.  I have a rash on my scalp (psoriasis?) and I am finding no improvement in my migraines. I haven't had to go to the ER so maybe it lessened the severity.

Side Effects: ive been on it for 2 days these are my side effects so far. feeling extremely euphoric. happy saying nice thigs to everyone. etc. then i got extremely cold. wich brought on whole body tremors. then the tremors led to me being completely drained physically and tired.
Comments: it helps with all the things goin on in my head. like im more mellow not as anxious. but this was supposed to help with my concentration. wich is so bad i space out so much i get panic attacks cuz i cant get out of the rut. and it scares me. but it hasnt helped at all. so im going to ask for maybe aderral with my depakote i think that would be a perfect combination.

Side Effects: WEIGHT GAIN_ Tiredness
Comments: Actually other than the extreme weight gain and being tired all the time I have to say it certainly worked for my migrains. I have debilitating migrains and they went away soon after taking this medicine. I also felt pretty evenly balanced when taking Depakote as oposed to others I have tried especially Abilify. However_ I have 3 kids and was always tired during the day_ I excercised_ ate right and went from 100 lbs to 210 lbs and due to health issues from the weight gain I am switching to Geodon. I am scared because I know Depakote wasnt to bad a drug for me but I need to get the wieght off. My doctor recommended Gastric Bypass but if it is medicine weight I am not convinced it will work. Any sugestions?

Side Effects: Insomnia - I am really_ really tired but I can't sleep other than for a couple of fitful hours except every third or fourth day. My legs and arms feel like they need to be moving when I lay down. Really weird.Shoulder and Neck pain.Very hungry for sweets - I am eating too much ice cream and unable to exercise because of other injuries sustained in accident. I have gained 5 pounds so far.I have problems finishing sentences_ usually just the last word. I know what I want to say but I just can't spit it out.I do not want to be around more than one or two other people. Not like me at all. I have always enjoyed parties.Tired. Tired. Tired.
Comments: My bike flipped and I smacked headfirst into the pavement. They tell me I have Post Concussive Syndrome. I am not sure this is the right drug for me. I am on 500mg ER. Some of my symptoms might be from the accident/concussion.

Side Effects: Some hair loss. Moderate weight gain.  Hard to get out of bed in morning.
Comments: I'm trying to get back on this.  I tried Geodon and Lamictal and have extreme side effects.  Don't know which one is causing the problem.  I had good luck with this medication except for the depression that I had.  I am going to try and stay on the Lamictal since it helps my depression quite well.

Side Effects: weight gain_ lethargy_ vivid dreams
Comments: i weighed 120 lbs my senior year in high school_ went to college had a manic episode and was treated with 1000 mg of depakote ER and now weigh around 200_ to me it's easier to deal with being depressed than it is being manic_ so it helps with the manic side for the most part_ i can't go out places alone because i usually have anxiety attacks_ mild mind games or feelings of paranoia_ i change sleeping patterns often b/c i haven't had a steady job in a while_ i'm thinking of switching medications b/c i used to be a confident skinny kid with a lot of energy but now it's hard to get motivated_ i'm going to look more into lamictal probably any other suggestions?

Side Effects: Heartburn_ slight increase in appetite.
Comments: So far_ so good.  Taking w/ 10mg of Lexapro and all seems good so far. Just hope I don't loose my hair!

Side Effects: was doing great with this and my other coctails until hair started faling out in clumps!  Can anyone tell me how long it took off the Depakote for your hair to stop falling out?
Comments: I have been off it for about a month now_ and I still have a ton of breakage and hair loss by the handful.  Psych wants me to have a Dermatology consult.  I am taking Selenium and Zinc as he suggested_ I just don't know if the hair loss should last this long.Help please would be really appreciated!

Side Effects: Slower mental function. Heartburn_ bad breath. A possible cause of my new rosacea_ eczema & extreme photosensitivity?
Comments: In spite of the side effects_ I found that this medicine changed my life by reducing my anger & aggression so much. However_ now I've gotten rosacea_ I wonder if I should switch-- rosacea is a tremendous handicap in itself. But having been on just about everything else_ I don't know what else to take. Query: has anyone else gotten rosacea/eczema from Depakote?

Side Effects: Diffused Brain Atrophy (loss of brain's gray matter)_ confusion and inability to concentrate
Comments: I am filling this out for my 9 year old son. I wish I had found this site earlier so I could get the word out. He has been taken off the Depakote due to it causing the Atrophy. Not only did it cause concentration problems_it also dropped his IQ by 17 points. This is a "new" side effect that is just being discovered. Most doctors don't know anything about it. The main study groups were in Europe_ with only one here in the US. If you are having this symptom_ please notify your doctor and get off the medication. Fortunately_ the gray matter will grow back but it can take 3-12 months for a person to get back to "normal".

Side Effects: Always hungry. Must be careful to not overeat.
Comments: Topamax was awful. I was having horrendous nightmares and panic attacks from it so quit it and started Depakote ER. I have been VERY happy with it. Nothing like the Topamax. It is wonderful to wake up in the morning without a daily migraine. Have only had 2 since I started about 2 months ago. Nice to have my life back. Hope it continues.

Side Effects: WANT TO EAT AND EAT AND EAT_ BUT I EXERCISE ALOT_ AND I THINK IF I JUST HAVE SELF CONTROL I'LL BE OK. HAVE HAD QUITE A FEW VIVID NIGHTMARES_ BUT I NOTICED MEDITATION/RELAXATION_ AND PRAYER BEFORE BED FIGHTS THEM OFF.
Comments: %%%%ONLY BEEN ON IT A RELATIVELY SHORT TIME. SEEMS TO HAVE DECREASED MY MANIA WHICH IS WONDERFUL BECAUSE I CAN BECOME VERY AGGRESSIVE_ AMONGST THE OTHER SYMPTOMS OF MANIA. ON THE OTHER HAND IT SEEMED TO INCREASE THE DEPRESSION_ BUT I DO BELIEVE THAT SINCE THE MANIA IS BETTER I'M DEALING WITH THE SAME DEPRESSION THAT'S ALWAYS BEEN THERE. IT'S NOT DEPRESSION THAT SUDDENLY SHOWED UP_ THE ABSENCE OF MANIA HAS JUST PUT THE SPOTLIGHT ON THE DEPRESSION NOW_ WHICH EXERCISE_ AND OTHER ACTIVITIES CAN HELP. MEDICATION HELPS_ BUT WE MUST ALL BE PROACTIVE IN OUR HEALING. I WILL UP DATE AGAIN LATER. (CURRENTLY ON 500 MG OF THE ER_ NOT IN COMBINATION WITH ANY OTHER DRUG.) =KENDRA

Side Effects: %%%%OH YEA_ AND CLINCHING OF MY JAW LIKE THE LADY BELOW ME.. HOPEFULLY MEDITATION WILL RELAX THIS AS WELL. -KENDRA

cant sit still_ clenching my teeth_ irritability_ some weight gain-but i kinda like my new badonkadonk butt. I was underweight before the depakote. Difficulty concentrating and finishing sentences_ like right now.
Comments: Just hope I feel better soon. I sleep fine but I always did_ it was getting out of bed that was the hard part.

Side Effects: Significant weight gain ( 40+ lbs )_ very noticible tremor in left hand.
Comments: My wife says it is working great.  I didn't realize how well it was working on my Bi-Polar until my doctor tried to switch my meds due to the weight gain.  Significantly helped to reduce the migranes.  I had one set which literally lasted for over 3 months before the medication.  I am taking 1500mg daily.

Side Effects: groggy and nauseated in the beginning. Stated taking whole dose of 1_200 (even tho it was ER) at night and that eliminated the nausea_ but worsened the grogginess in the morning. Overall_ this drug probably saved my life. I was comorbid with epilepsy and bipolar 2 and able to have monotherapy for both disorders with this drug. It's not perfect_ but it has helped me to live a normal life. Someday I would like to be medication free_ but am not willing yet to experiment by going off Depakote. No weight gain whatsoever_ btw_ nor have I had any hair loss in 4 years.
Comments: Overall_ saved me. Works like a miricle drug for some_ a living hell for others. I was one of the "lucky" ones.

Side Effects: dramatic weight gain_ tremendous hair loss_ dry skin_ along with a whole host of additional problems.Side-effects place one at risk for the development of diabetes.
Comments: This medication promotes weight gain to the same degree as anti-psychotics.  I believe major metabolic changes have occurred due to my old methods of weight loss no longer applying.  Based on personal experience it's the type of weight gain that sticks and is extremely stubborn.  Went from a solid 6'1" 215 to 265 since late September 2006.  I stopped the medication in December 2006 after the realization that my physical health was in rapid decline.  A sound physical body takes years to achieve.  An ambitious Doctor and prescription pad can erase those hard-earned gains in months.

Side Effects: No side effects. It has worked well for me and I've taken it for 19 years.
No side effects. It has worked well for me and I've taken it for 19 years.
Major hair loss. Constipation. Difficulty having an orgasm.
Comments: I would have loved to stay on this medication because it really helped my migraines more than any other medication I have taken BUT I lost over 1/3 of my hair. I was told this only occurred on high doses - not true. I was told this was temporary but it was not in my case so I finally stopped. Now my migraines are back.

Side Effects: maybe gained 5 lbs_ not too many side effects I can think of...
Comments: Depakote changed my life_ lifted the veil of darkness and left me functioning like a "normal" person.

Side Effects: Disorentation
Comments: I am on more than depakote and combined with Seroquel_ Zoloft and Trileptal there were devastating effects.

Side Effects: Weight gain; drowsiness.
Comments: Is a good mood stabilizer for Bipolar I.  Was relatively stable on it for years.  I have recently gone back on it after Topamax.

Side Effects: EXTREME lethargy; excessive sleep; terrible nightmares
Comments: 1000mg/daily.My doctor prescribed this as a supplement to Lamictal to prevent mood changes.  Fairly soon after taking this medicine I was nearly unable to function.  At first I was instructed to take this at night before bed.  When I would wake up in the morning it was absolute hell; I could not pull myself out of bed.  I was completely exhausted_ no matter if I got 8 hours of good sleep.  If I were to take a nap and set an alarm_ there was no way I could wake up.  Waking up from sleep on depakote was like trying to get out of bed with a 6 ton weight on top of me.  To make matters worse_ I experienced very frightening and realistic nightmares several times a week - the worst dreams of my life.  My dr suggested taking it in the morning yet that did not help - I only suffered lethargy throughout the day and was not capable of functioning.

Side Effects: Weight gain_ hair loss_ hand tremor_ mental dullness...YET pulled me out of a complete mixed episode (1 week in hospital) in just 2 months. Hoping to counter hair loss with vitamins. Weight gain seems to come when I change doses (1500 right now). Taking Concerta to counter mental dullness. Also take Wellbutrin EX for depression half of bipolar. Haven't ruled out lowering dose or switching to different med_ as I am newly diagnosed. If I can't get weight off with diet/exercise and hair back with vitamins_ I'm not sure I will stay on it.
Comments: Regarding recent comment on this site that "women should not take Depakote"_ it could be said if you were a woman of childbearing years and had NOT had children yet or were hoping to have them soon (next 1 - 2 years). You SHOULD NOT GET PREGNANT on Depakote ER_ the inserts with the med states that it is KNOWN (not possibly_ in mice) but KNOWN to cause birth defects. While I am of childbearing age_ I have 2 children and have no plans to get pregnant. My Drs. explained to me the protocol for an "unplanned" pregnancy wouldn't be pretty: immediate removal of Depakote_ probably within the safety of a hospital and a switch to a different med or no meds at all - but would be humanly possible with a probability of no ill effects on the child. OBVIOUSLY_ I don't plan on taking the risk but accidents do happen. I can imagine for those who have not yet started their families Depakote might be a difficult choice.

Side Effects: Initially I had heartburn_ but it was mild and went away in time. I was also very tired but that wore off after 2 weeks or so.
Comments: I'm only taking 250mg at night but I don't notice any side effects. I think it has helped reduce the severity/frequency of some of my migraines. I still have menstrual migraines that are hard to control. I should be taking 500 mg a day but I just get worried about side effects.

Side Effects: I have essential tremor which became much worse when taking a full dose (2000mg).  But I now take less Depakote to lessen the tremor (somewhat) plus Lamictal to make up the difference. For seizures_ the only problem is word-finding difficulties_ which Lamictal is better for.  Strangely_ though_ I have taken Depakote for years and only recently am starting to lose my hair? (!)
Comments: Depakote stabilized my moods wonderfully and I haven't experienced any seizures or seizure-like symptoms while taking it.

Side Effects: Sluggishness_ depersonalization/feeling disconnected from myself & body_ heart palpitations/racing heart_ spacy periods where my eyes glaze over.
Comments: It has totally taken away my headaches. I am hoping the side effects may be transient but I am concerned I've traded one problem for an equally bad one.

Side Effects: Sluggishness_ light-headedness_ depersonalization/feeling disconnected from myself & body_ heart palpitations/racing heart_ spacy periods where my eyes glaze over.
Comments: It has totally taken away my headaches. I am hoping the side effects may be transient but I am concerned I've traded one problem for an equally bad one.

Side Effects: Major insomnia for six months_ then it disappeared and I now sleep fine.  Occasional mild depersonalization (a feeling that you're watching the world through a camera_ though you still think and act and speak normally)_ and occasionally_ while talking with someone_ I'll kind of feel my eyes glaze over (always wonder if it's noticeable to the other person).
Comments: I was having partial simple seizures (spacey_ light-headed feelings that last a minute or so) and then had a grand mal and was put on Trileptal.  As the neurologist ramped up my dosage_  I started getting partial simple seizures again_ commensurate with the increasing dosage.  I switched neurologists and my new one put me on Depakote and the partial simple seizures immediately stopped.  She ramped me up to 1500 mg a day and got me off the Trileptal.  After a couple years I ramped myself down to 750 mg a day of Depakote and remain seizure-free with less depersonalization and that glazed-over feeling--I'm quite pleased with Depakote.

Side Effects: Not many negatives.  Sometimes a bit tired but on the other hand sometimes extremely energetic. (not manic like_ just an intense focus and endurance)
Comments: I admit I combine this with a low dose antidepressant but it's the clincher.  Years ago I was always jumpy and often felt like my brain was short circuting or something.  I had a slightly abnormal EEG but never an all out fit so it's up in the air between simple partials and panic.  Whatever my diagnosis this seems to_ I don't know_ modulate everything.  No Complaints.  A lifesaver actually.

Side Effects: Only positive!
Comments: I love this stuff.  I take it with Prozac 20mg and it's a great balance.  The best thing about this anticonvulsant in my opinion is  that compared to others it has 3 distinct advantages for me:1.  Eliminates seizures2.  No cognitive impairment or confusion as with lamictal3.  Eliminates ALL flushing and anticipatory anxiety_ in short it destroys anxiety.

Side Effects: increased appetite_ large weight gain. mood swings am getting in trouble at school now because i am angry and depressed all the time.
Comments: helped better than the regular kind. but seem in a daze alot

Side Effects: Major hair loss_ increased appetite.
Comments: Really helped my headaches and lessened the severity and frequency of my many migraines but the  hair loss was too much for me to take.  Reluctantly going off.  My hair is too important to me.  Hopefully_ I can find another drug that will help without such side-effects.

Side Effects: Dulled intellectual intensity_ calm feeling_ feeling of being under water_ thoughts slowed_ repetitive thoughts disappeared_ no headaches_ gained maybe 5 lbs
Comments: Depakote definitely calms mania & helps rapid cycling but it didn't ultimately provide relief from debilitating_ sudden depressions during which I would go off my medication in order to stop its dampening_ antidepressant effect. I also used to go off my meds and make art since these drugs hampered my creative instincts. This drug has an artificial effect and I always wished they would just let me take it when I really "needed" it because I felt the way it effected my mind otherwise was too overwhelming. Needless to say I graduated college & worked steadily whilst on this medication.

Side Effects: Weight gain_ insomnia_ shakiness_ anxiety
Comments: I'm like a one-man drug trial_ but Depakote was one that definitely didn't work for me.  I didn't see any noticeable change in behavior at 1500mg a day_ aside from increased anxiety_ paranoia_ plus added weight.  The worst side effect was insomnia--I simply could not sleep while taking this drug.  I would finally fall asleep about sunrise and get maybe a couple hours.  I'm taking Lamictal now with fewer side effects and more results_ though it's too early to know for sure.

I have not started taking it yet and am going to start today but I noticed that most of the posters on here were women. My Dr whom is a very respected headache specialist told me WOMEN SHOULD NOT TAKE DEPAKOTE. Please fully investigate as I read alot of negative reviews and after seeing hack DRs for years I realized one must really see a specialist and do much research ones self. Hope that helps. Do your homework!

Side Effects: Weight Gain_ Aggressive towards others
Comments: This medicine the first few months seemed to work for me other than Weight Gain. Towards the end I became very unpleasent to be around bitching at everyone for everything. Would get in fights for virtually no reason and this was very uncommon and unlike my normal behavior before hand.

Side Effects: I took 1 pill of this and poured the rest down the toilet.  The very 1st pill made me feel so much anxienty_ panic.. and traumatic emotional overload I wanted to die.. Total fear and lost of emotional control. I also vomited. It gave me faint like feelings_ trembling and cold sweat and chills.  I'll never take it again.

Major hair lost I am losing in hand fulls everytime I touch my hair.  My bed is full of my hair and my clothes.  I am starting to bruise without reason easily.  Tired all the time_ some days I do not want to get out of the bed
Comments: I would not recommed this med_ I am going to stop taking it

Side Effects: don't have any
tired all the time  sems to have made the side effect from topamax worse
Comments: been on topamax 200 mg twice a day for 3 years headaches much worse. depakote 250er was added will increase to500mg. headaches only slightly better but hungry all the time_ depressed and TIRED

Side Effects: It cut off the good moods but worsened the depression. In a matter of minutes_ I will feel suicidal. I'm tired all the time_ but have horrible nightmares. My shoulders and elbows hurt constantly. Didn't help with anxiety at all. I feel like a zombie. The first month_ I vomited_ tinnitis_ shaking_ always felt cold or hot. I have taken everything else and nothing works. This was the last option. I think I'd rather have mood swings than this constant depression and lethargy. Libido is almost gone. Most of the side-effects I have had aren't listed and the doctor doesn't seem to believe me_ although I'm on no other drugs. I've really tried to make this work_ but I'm giving up on it.
Comments: My friends say it seems to have made me even more depressed and I'm never happy anymore. I suddenly cry for no reason. My skin itches and I'm going to stop taking it.

Side Effects: Increase in appetite (hungry under two hours after eating)_ hair loss (head)_ body hair growth (back)_ slight memory loss_ occasional stumbling over words when speaking
Comments: Switched to ER for convenience of not taking pill mid-day.  Put on 35 pounds on regular Depakote and on ER (took regular Depakote 9 years prior).  But WORTH IT- when phased off once_ suffered seizure within days- when on either med_ NO SEIZURES EVER!

Side Effects: Weight gain_ hair loss
Comments: I'm 5'6 and I weighed about 130 pounds when I started Depakote ER (500 mg/day). After being on it only a month I had gained 10 pounds.  I was constantly hungry.  I also have very thick hair and it started falling out in small clumps. I have headaches every day which my neurologist says are some kind of migraine and out of the 30 days I was on Depakote_ I still had a headache for 25 of them. I am switching to Topamax_ hope it works!

Side Effects: some tiredness and hair loss
Comments: Excellent and I have not had a seizure in 6 years

Side Effects: rash_ weight gain_ trouble sleeping
Comments: i dont really like it i am tired alot and i dont sleep well at night i have gained some weight taking it and i am constantly itching all over.

Side Effects: No Negatives.
Comments: Take with low dose Prozac. Awesome reults. Thank you God.

Side Effects: Mom's point of view for daughter on this medication.Extreme increase in attitude.Drama queen.Takes at night and falls asleep almost immedietly.A/B student now flunking.Was taking Depakote twice a day.Is somewhat better with Dep ER.Appetite increase.
Comments: EEG now shows normal.Liver normal.More hyperactivity.Angry.Can't comprehend some things and can't stay focused. Mom doesn't like and is looking for other options.This is the 4th medication in 8 months.So far is the best but still not happy with it.

Side Effects: Migraines_ hair loss_ large weight gain 120lb. In 2.5 years_ tremors in the arms and hands_ indigestion_ reduced memory
Comments: This medication worked wonders_ but due to the side effects it was not the medication for me.  I gained 120 pounds in 2.5 years I went from 140 to 260 pounds. It gave massive migraines that rendered me useless.  I do recommend this med but make sure you are willing to live with bad side effects

Side Effects: Hair loss_ weight gain (15+ lbs)_ hand tremors_ "flat-line" affect (i.e. no true depression but lack of caring about much of anything; no joy)
Hair loss_ weight gain (20 lbs in 5 months)_ serious tremors.
Comments: I am on 2000 mg. of Depakote for mania and notice that not many people are on that high of an amount.  It does work for mania but sometimes (especially lately) I feel very depressed.  It worked at a lower does but my doc thinks I might get manic again

Side Effects: severe headache_ tremor_ asthenia_ nausea_ trouble thinking
Comments: I could not tolerate depakote at all when added to the other medications I was taking (cymbalta_ topamax_ lamictal).  I don't recommend it be added to a complicated pharmaceutical regimen.

Side Effects: Loss of appetite_ exhaustion_ lethargy_ disturbed sleep_ extreme dry mouth
Comments: Haven't heard anything about this but I have a constant_ lingering_ bad taste in my mouth ALL THE TIME. It makes a lot of food and drinks taste AWFUL_ so I have little desire to eat. Lost 5 pounds in a week. Also_ have constant dry mouth_ can't get enough water even though i drink constantly.

Side Effects: None.
Comments: Since I've been on this_ I haven't had one migraine and I get depressed a few times a year for a day instead of every month for a week or two.  It's also helped to make my ADHD more mild - so I haven't taken my adderall more than once a week for a few months.

Side Effects: Side effects minimal with the extended release version.  This AED is the best I have ever taken.  No cognitive impairment as with Lamictal_ Dilantin_ Tegretol_ etc...
Comments: This drug works in so many different ways to calm the overactive mind it is truly unique and unbelievable.  I will never change_ regardless of what happens.  My liver has always been fine on it.  Side effects are definitely less taking 250mg 3x a day.  Although it is extended release I notice it most effective with at least twice daily dosing. Not only controls seizures for me but it OBLITERATES the anxiety accompanying the seizure disorder.

Side Effects: WEIGHT GAIN.  hand Tremors
Comments: Worked like a charm on my headaches.  I went from 3-4 per week to 3-4 per month.  Weight gain is worth it.

Side Effects: complete loss of control of actions
Comments: This drug changed who I was for years. My grades dropped from all A's and B's to nearly all E's. It made me feel emotionless. I did what I wanted_ when I wanted and had no regrets. I had no conscience. I had no feelings. I did what I thought was fun. When I quit taking it_ I had withdrawal symptoms. Sometimes_ I could not even stand up without feeling like I was going to faint. I would get severe migraines and had to start seeing a nuerologist for them. I could not focus. I would get dizzy all the time. It feels good while you are taking it_ but it changes who you are. The feeling is almost like ecstasy. You become an addict and don't realize what it does to you. It is horrible.

Side Effects: Weight Gain_ Depression_ skin rash_ really really heavy period_ serious mood swings.
Comments: I've been on it for little over a year and really didn't start to have to many problems with it untill probably two months ago_ and things are just getting worse.

Side Effects: None.
Comments: Seems to work to prevent migraines...haven't had one since I have been on it.

Side Effects: 15 pound weight gain and drowsiness;  less sexual
Comments: complete relief of migraine and migraine visual disturbances; end of hypomania

Side Effects: I have been taking Depakote along with Paxil for 6 years now and have noticed only two things.  Up until recently I didn't even connect them with the medication but after reading other patients reviews I realize they may be related.  Around 6 months after I began medication I began having hand tremors as well as very vivid dreams.  Sometimes the dreams were horrible and sometimes they were merely disturbing.  But most of all they were tremendously vivid and difficult to wake from.  Has this happened to anyone else?
Comments: Depakote definitely fixed my mood swings!

Side Effects: it overloader live with amonia and almost put me in a coma two year in a row_ also left liver damage
Comments: stay away!!! if you must take make sure the doc. is aways checking you blood for everyting!!!!!

Side Effects: Very Tired_ dizziness_ some nausea_ visual changes (like I'm drunk) Very Mellow_ too mellow
Comments: I'm way too relaxed if that makes any sense.  And I can't drive anywere.  I'm not able to drive since starting it.

Side Effects: Weight gain - Almost 7 lbs. in 1 week; Tremors & Shaking; Disoriented; My depression worsened; Overall sluggish feeling; Fatigue; Stomach pains. A very scary experience.
Comments: This was the worse medication I have ever taken. Upon further research_ I could not believe all the problems associated with this drug. I literally felt like I was going to die.

Side Effects: I think that my appetite is coming back_ I usually exist on little food and the drugs WHICH I KNOW IS BAD. I have found myself eating salty/sugar stuff -  WAY OUT OF THE ORDINARY for me. Stuff I never eat. Chips. Donuts- donuts? I never eat pastry/cake/pie. I was able to go out grocery shopping today for 2 hours and get home without feeling panicky and freaked out. Going out of my place is trial enough. I am up past 9pm tonight - saturday. I am usually out on work nights by 9pm and even on weekends.It is only my second day on 500 mg. I am off Lamictal now_ slight withdrawal still but mild [out of body feeling for a few seconds] and something else I can't quite put into words.
Comments: I hope that now this will be my final medicine change. I have been trying to find my combination for 5 years. I believe I am somewhat autistic/ADD - definite ptsd_ depression_ anxiety_ panic has been nullifed down to anxiety. I think I am starting to take better care of myself.Every super smart person seems to have one vice or quirk that really stands out. I think that this is mine. I haven't had any hair fall out more than normal. The eating thing is good though. I have cooked twice for myself and not

Side Effects: I had severe weight gain_ light headedness_ tremors and forgetfulnes.  My baby of 8 months now has liver problems do to the med. and spent 1 month in NICU
Comments: Please do not take Depakote ever it is one of the worst there is

Side Effects: my hair was fallin out like crazy_so much i broke my vacuum_i gain like 50 pounds and my period stoped when i stoped using it_
Comments: stay away!!!i also sleept most of my day and felt like a walking zombie_ and my hands would shake when i tried writing and hurt when i tried carring or even just using them.

Side Effects: some of the side effects for me were common_ so i was told. i lost about 5 pounds the first 2 weeks of taking ER. my appetite has diminished. nothing looks appetizing anymore. ive been on this drug for 2 months now and lost 11 pounds and i feel like a different person MOOD-wise. i love this!

First four months_ massive food appetite_ diminished now-but ran into a fat food craving cycle to deal with appetite increse that was (is) hard to break out of- some hair loss- catch intense light in corner of eye periodically-like a flash of white light
Comments: was on lithium for 12 years and had to get off for kidney sake-was afraid to try Depakote but it feels like a better drug for me- this time of year I would feel more irritable and more depressed- but I feel lighter mood consistently-looking forward to seeing how it works_ also take celexa

Side Effects: none
Not as much tiredness as with dilantin_ but have more frequent and severe breakthrough seizures. Also weight gain - incredible appetite. Low libido.
Hair Loss.  Weight Gain.  Feeling tired and sleepy ALL OF THE TIME!
Comments: Still have (pre-menstrual) migraines each month.  Hopefully after menopause they'll subside!?

Side Effects: three days after beginning_ I got a headache that would not go away only interrupted by my usual course of migraines every one to two weeks. I also seemed to have increased ulcerative colitis activity believed to be either from the medicine or the constant deep throbbing pain in my head causing stress. I had to get off the drug before I did something stupid due to the pain.
I really like this.  It is even smoother than the Depakote.  ER is extended release_ and I did not experience the abrupt sleepiness and then drop off I had noticed with the non-extended release.
